Random display Boot Logo DISABLED: Random display of boot logo disabled
Random display Boot Logo ENABLED: Random display of boot logo enabled
This bootlogo cannot be previewed!: This boot logo cannot be previewed!
This theme is missing preview images!: This theme is missing preview images!
theme_help: Install theme files. For detailed instructions, press the X key to view help.
logo_help: Set the boot logo. You can set single display or random display. For detailed instructions, press the X key to view help.
back.theme_help: Backup the current theme. Note that this operation will overwrite the original backup file.
restore.theme_help: Restore the backed-up theme to the current system. The theme was backed up by the theme backup function.
restore.stock_help: Restore the automatically backed-up official theme. This backup was created automatically by the modified system.
help_theme: Tip: You can back up the original theme before installing a new theme. The new backup will overwrite the original backup file.
help_logo: Tip: Please select your favorite boot logo image and set it.
message_02-1:
1. Theme files should be placed in 'anbernic/themes' on SD1 or SD2.
Theme files must be .zip archives, with corresponding .png preview images
matching the same filename and directory structure.
message_02-2:
2. Boot logo images should be placed in 'anbernic/bootlogo'
on SD1 or SD2. Files must be .bmp images with the same resolution as the device.
The boot image for the RG28xx must be rotated beforehand.
message_02-3:
3. 'Backup Theme' and 'Restore Backup' only affect currently installed
system themes. They do not apply to uninstalled theme files.
'Random Display' enables random boot logo selection on startup. This feature
automatically disables when a theme with boot logo is installed.
